languages.text: {n}Девушка хмурится и кляузническим тоном добавляет:{/n} "Я просила почтенного Абеляра приставить и меня к ответственному делу, но он повелел прибыть на раут, где я никак не могу послужить Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: {n}Девушка хмурится и кляузническим тоном добавляет:{/n} "Я просила почтенного Абеляра приставить и меня к ответственному делу, но он повелел прибыть на раут, где я никак не могу послужить Вашей милости".

languages.text: {n}Astartia frowns and adds peevishly,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he bid me to attend the reception, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка хмурится и кляузническим тоном добавляет:{/n} "Я просила почтенного Абеляра приставить и меня к ответственному делу, но он повелел прибыть на раут, где я никак не могу послужить Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: {n}Astartia frowns and adds captiously,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he told me to be at the rout, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Astartia frowns and adds captiously,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he told me to be at the rout, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Astartia frowns and adds peevishly,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he bid me to be attend the reception, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Astartia frowns and adds peevishly,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he bid me to be attend the reception, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Astartia frowns and adds peevishly,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he bid me to attend the reception, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}アスタルチアは眉をひそめて不機嫌そうに付け加える。{/n}「尊敬すべきアベラルドに重要な任務も私に任せて欲しいとお願いしたのですが、歓迎会に参加するように命じられたのです。ここで私がお役に立てることなどありません、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}Astartia frowns and adds peevishly,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he bid me to attend the reception, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}アスタルチアは眉をひそめて不機嫌そうに付け加える。{/n}「尊敬すべきアベラルドに重要な任務も私に任せて欲しいとお願いしたのですが、歓迎会に参加するように命じられたのです。ここで私がお役に立てることなどありません、陛下」

languages.text: {n}艾丝塔西娅皱起眉头，忿忿不平地补充道。{/n}“我也请求过尊敬的阿贝拉德，让他也给我安排些重要的工作，但他却要我参加盛典。在那里，我什么也做不了，也不能为大人您效劳。”
languages.original_text: {n}Astartia frowns and adds peevishly,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he bid me to attend the reception, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾丝塔西娅皱起眉头，忿忿不平地补充道。{/n}“我也请求过尊敬的阿贝拉德，让他也给我安排些重要的工作，但他却要我参加盛典。在那里，我什么也做不了，也不能为大人您效劳。”

languages.text: {n}Astartia frunce el ceño e, irritada, añade:{/n} «Pedí al venerable Abelard que me asignara alguna labor importante, pero me encargó que asistiera a esta recepción, en la que no puedo ayudar en nada a mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Astartia frowns and adds peevishly,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he bid me to attend the reception, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Astartia frunce el ceño e, irritada, añade:{/n} «Pedí al venerable Abelard que me asignara alguna labor importante, pero me encargó que asistiera a esta recepción, en la que no puedo ayudar en nada a mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}Avec une pointe d'irritation dans la voix, Astartia se permet d'ajouter :{/n} « J'ai demandé à l'honorable Abélard de me confier une tâche importante, mais il m'a prié d'assister à la réception, où je ne peux rien faire pour être utile à Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Astartia frowns and adds peevishly,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he bid me to attend the reception, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec une pointe d'irritation dans la voix, Astartia se permet d'ajouter :{/n} « J'ai demandé à l'honorable Abélard de me confier une tâche importante, mais il m'a prié d'assister à la réception, où je ne peux rien faire pour être utile à Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Astartia verzieht das Gesicht und fügt mürrisch hinzu:{/n} "Ich habe den geschätzten Abelard gebeten, mich ebenfalls dieser wichtigen Aufgabe zuzuteilen, aber er sagte, ich solle dem Empfang beiwohnen, wo ich nichts tun kann, um Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu dienen."
languages.original_text: {n}Astartia frowns and adds peevishly,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he bid me to attend the reception, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Astartia verzieht das Gesicht und fügt mürrisch hinzu:{/n} "Ich habe den geschätzten Abelard gebeten, mich ebenfalls dieser wichtigen Aufgabe zuzuteilen, aber er sagte, ich solle dem Empfang beiwohnen, wo ich nichts tun kann, um Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zu dienen."

languages.text: {n}Astartia, kaşlarını çatıp aksi bir şekilde ekliyor.{/n} "Saygıdeğer Abelard'dan bana da önemli bir vazife vermesini istedim ama kendisi, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne hiçbir şekilde hizmette bulunamayacağım bu merasime katılmamı emretti."
languages.original_text: {n}Astartia frowns and adds peevishly,{/n} "I asked the esteemed Abelard to put me to some important task too, but he bid me to attend the reception, where I can do nothing to serve Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Astartia kaşlarını çatıyor ve aksi bir şekilde ekliyor:{/n} "Saygıdeğer Abelard'dan bana da önemli bir vazife vermesini istedim ama kendisi, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerine hizmet etmek için elimden hiçbir şey gelmeyen resepsiyona katılmamı emretti."
